Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis is proud to announce the arrival of the new Tricentis Web Shop <https://support.tricentis.com/community/webshop.do>, making it easier for you to purchase Tosca Testsuite Training courses online.
SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY OFFER
Tricentis is offering the full self-paced Tricentis Certified Professional Program at a 75% DISCOUNT to the first 100 users to register for training.
Redeem your discount by:
- Logging in to the Support Portal - Navigating to the link to the Web Shop on the right-hand side - Adding the Tricentis Certified Professional Program SELF-PACED TRACK STANDARD to your cart - On checkout, enter the coupon code PROFESSIONAL75
Already have a TCUFL certificate?
No problem! You can gain the additional knowledge required to become a Tricentis Certified Professional by purchasing the SELF-PACED TRACK UPGRADE course in the Web Shop.
Be one of the first 100 users to register and receive a 75% DISCOUNT on the Upgrade package!
Simply follow the instructions above, add the Tricentis Certified Professional Program SELF-PACED TRACK UPGRADE to your cart, and enter the coupon code UPGRADE75 to snag this one-time offer.
So get clicking <https://support.tricentis.com/community/webshop.do>!
Best regards, The Tricentis Training Team
